VACANCY: FINANCE MANAGER

Ref: CXP106/2024

Location: KwaDukuza, Stanger

Salary: R60 000 – R70 000 TCTC  – based on experience and qualifications

Direct the financial operations of the company on behalf of the shareholders towards becoming a cost-effective profitable organization. Manage and Control the accounting department effectively and efficiently.

Criteria:
BCom/ BAccSci/ BCompt (Accounting) plus honours preferable.
Professional qualification (CIMA, ACCA, MBA or CA(SA))
Computer literate – MS Office, Google Suite and JD Edward compulsory
At least 7 – 10 years’ experience as a Finance Manager or Senior in Finance
Experience in systems implementation
Should be prepared to travel
Financial organisation skills
Proactive team leader and organisational skills

Apply via the link: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
